name: The Cosmic Is You
description:
The Cosmic Is You is an incomplete concept document for an analogue roleplaying game; it is not a finished game and does not have playable rules. Feel free to hack it into another system or develop your own rules for it, so long as you credit appropriately. Nora Blake and I have a loose annual tradition of making games inspired by aesthetic mood boards we make each on Pinterest; The Cosmic Is You is based on this board: aesthetic swap 2k20

Cover image uses a photo by Joel Filipe on Unsplash
